author: COMSOL
description: This tutorial shows how to simulate particle motion due to a Brownian force. The results are compared to the solution from a pure diffusion equation and show good agreement. Finally, a Monte Carlo simulation is performed which solves the model several times using a different set of random numbers each time.
label: brownian_motion.mph
name: root

settings.description: Avoid inverted elements by curving interior domain elements
settings.name: curvedinterior
